languages.text: {n}Пространство — иллюзорная переменная в глазах К'тан. Время — юный и банальный феномен для Него, ведь Он успел просуществовать в газово-энергетической купели вселенной целую вечность, ожидая, пока Время наконец родится. Факт и вероятность для Него — не более, чем абстракции, между которыми Он способен нестись на электромагнитных крыльях.{/n}

{n}To the C'tan, space is an illusory variable. To the C'tan, time is a young and trivial phenomenon, for It existed for an eternity in the gaseous energy fount of the universe before time was eventually born. To the C'tan, fact and probability are mere abstractions, between which It can soar on Its electromagnetic wings.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Пространство — иллюзорная переменная в глазах К'тан. Время — юный и банальный феномен для Него, ведь Он успел просуществовать в газово-энергетической купели вселенной целую вечность, ожидая, пока Время наконец родится. Факт и вероятность для Него — не более, чем абстракции, между которыми Он способен нестись на электромагнитных крыльях.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The space is an illusory parameter in C'Tan's eyes. The time is a young and banal phenomenon for Him, since He had existed for an entire eternity in the gas-energy font of the universe, waiting for the time to be finally born. The fact and the probability are just abstractions to Him, between which He could soar on His electromagnetic wings.{/n}

{n}The space is an illusory parameter in C'Tan's eyes. The time is a young and banal phenomenon for Him, since He had existed for an entire eternity in the gas-energy font of the universe, waiting for the time to be finally born. The fact and the probability are just abstractions to Him, between which He could soar on His electromagnetic wings.{/n}

{n}The space is an ephemeral variable in the C'Tan's eyes. The time is a young and hackneyed phenomenon for Him, since He had existed for an entire eternity in the gas-energy font of the universe, waiting for Time to eventually spring up. The fact and the probability are just abstractions to Him, between which He could hover powered by His electromagnetic wings.{/n}

{n}The space is an ephemeral variable in the C'Tan's eyes. The time is a young and hackneyed phenomenon for Him, since He had existed for an entire eternity in the gas-energy font of the universe, waiting for Time to eventually spring up. The fact and the probability are just abstractions to Him, between which He could hover powered by His electromagnetic wings.{/n}

{n}To the C'tan, space is an illusory variable. To the C'tan, time is a young and trivial phenomenon, for It existed for an eternity in the gaseous energy fount of the universe before time was eventually born. To the C'tan, fact and probability are mere abstractions, between which It can soar on Its electromagnetic wings.{/n}

{n}To the C'tan, space is an illusory variable. To the C'tan, time is a young and trivial phenomenon, for It existed for an eternity in the gaseous energy fount of the universe before time was eventually born. To the C'tan, fact and probability are mere abstractions, between which It can soar on Its electromagnetic wings.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'espace est une variable illusoire aux yeux du C'tan. Le temps est un phénomène récent et banal pour lui, car il existait depuis déjà une éternité dans la source d'énergie gazeuse de l'univers lorsque le temps s'est enfin manifesté. Les faits et les probabilités sont pour lui de simples abstractions entre lesquelles il peut voler, porté par ses ailes électromagnétiques.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}To the C'tan, space is an illusory variable. To the C'tan, time is a young and trivial phenomenon, for It existed for an eternity in the gaseous energy fount of the universe before time was eventually born. To the C'tan, fact and probability are mere abstractions, between which It can soar on Its electromagnetic wings.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'espace est une variable illusoire aux yeux du C'tan. Le temps est un phénomène récent et banal pour lui, car il existait depuis déjà une éternité dans la source d'énergie gazeuse de l'univers lorsque le temps s'est enfin manifesté. Les faits et les probabilités sont pour lui de simples abstractions entre lesquelles il peut voler, porté par ses ailes électromagnétiques.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El espacio es una variable ilusoria a ojos del C'tan. El tiempo es un fenómeno joven y trivial para Él, que existió durante toda una eternidad en la fuente de energía gaseosa del universo antes de que el tiempo naciera. Los hechos y la probabilidad son abstracciones para el C'Tan, y puede volar entre ellas con Sus alas electromagnéticas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}To the C'tan, space is an illusory variable. To the C'tan, time is a young and trivial phenomenon, for It existed for an eternity in the gaseous energy fount of the universe before time was eventually born. To the C'tan, fact and probability are mere abstractions, between which It can soar on Its electromagnetic wings.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El espacio es una variable efímera a ojos del C'Tan. El tiempo es un fenómeno joven y trillado para Él, porque existió durante toda una eternidad en la fuente de energía gaseosa del universo, esperando a que el tiempo naciera. Los hechos y la probabilidad son abstracciones para Él, y puede volar entre ellas con Sus alas electromagnéticas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}在星神眼中，空间本身仅仅是个虚幻的变量，而时间只是某种不值一提的景象。早在时间这个概念还没有诞生时，祂便已经在整个宇宙的气态能量中永恒地存在着，直到时间这个概念最终涌现为止。对祂而言，“事实”与“可能”仅仅是抽象的概念，祂可以张开它的电磁之翼，轻而易举地在两者之间往复穿梭。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}To the C'tan, space is an illusory variable. To the C'tan, time is a young and trivial phenomenon, for It existed for an eternity in the gaseous energy fount of the universe before time was eventually born. To the C'tan, fact and probability are mere abstractions, between which It can soar on Its electromagnetic wings.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}在星神眼中，空间本身仅仅是个短暂的变量，而时间只是某种年轻而平凡的景象。早在时间这个概念还没有诞生时，祂便已经在整个宇宙的气态能量中永恒地存在着，直到时间这个概念最终涌现为止。对祂而言，“事实”与“可能”仅仅是抽象的概念，祂可以轻而易举地在两者之间往复穿梭。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Für den C'tan ist Raum eine illusorische Variabe. Für den C'tan ist Zeit ein junges und triviales Problem, denn Er hatte schon seit ein Ewigkeit in der gasförmigen Energiequelle des Universums existiert, ehe die Zeit geboren wurde. Für den C'tan sind Fakten und Wahrscheinlichkeiten bloße Abstraktionen, zwischen denen Er seine elektromagnetischen Flügel ausbreiten kann.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}To the C'tan, space is an illusory variable. To the C'tan, time is a young and trivial phenomenon, for It existed for an eternity in the gaseous energy fount of the universe before time was eventually born. To the C'tan, fact and probability are mere abstractions, between which It can soar on Its electromagnetic wings.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Raum ist in den Augen des C'tan eine flüchtige Variable. Die Zeit ist für ihn ein junges, banales Phänomen, denn er hatte eine ganze Ewigkeit lang in dem Gasenergiebrunnen des Universums existiert und darauf gewartet, dass die Zeit endlich irgendwann entsteht. Die Tatsache und die Wahrscheinlichkeit sind für ihn nur Abstraktionen, zwischen denen er von seinen elektromagnetischen Flügeln angetrieben schweben könnte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ク＝タンにとって、宇宙は儚い変数に過ぎない。ク＝タンにとって、時間とは幼く、ありふれた現象にすぎない。それは宇宙のガスエネルギーの泉の中に永遠に存在し、やがて時間が生まれるのを待っていたのだから。事実も確率も、彼にとってはその間を電磁翼で飛び回ることのできる抽象的なものに過ぎないのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}To the C'tan, space is an illusory variable. To the C'tan, time is a young and trivial phenomenon, for It existed for an eternity in the gaseous energy fount of the universe before time was eventually born. To the C'tan, fact and probability are mere abstractions, between which It can soar on Its electromagnetic wings.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}宇宙はク＝タンの目には儚い変数に過ぎない。時間は彼にとっては幼く、ありふれた現象似すぎない。彼は宇宙のガスエネルギー・フォントの中に永遠に存在し、やがて時間が生まれるのを待っていたのだから。事実も確率も、彼にとってはその間を電磁翼で飛び回ることのできる抽象的なものに過ぎないのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}C'tan için uzay, aldatıcı bir değişkendir. C'tan için zaman, toy ve önemsiz bir fenomendir çünkü kendisi, zaman var olmadan önce evrenin gaz enerjisi kaynağında ebediyen var olmuştur. C'tan için gerçek ve olasılıklar; elektromanyetik kanatlarıyla arasında süzülebileceği, soyut birer kavramdır.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}To the C'tan, space is an illusory variable. To the C'tan, time is a young and trivial phenomenon, for It existed for an eternity in the gaseous energy fount of the universe before time was eventually born. To the C'tan, fact and probability are mere abstractions, between which It can soar on Its electromagnetic wings.{/n}
